name: Thermal Relief Over Via
description: Places a through hole pad over selected via(s) to make thermal reliefs for soldering DIY boards.
description_full: This is for DIY circuit boards with vias in copper pour or thick traces that need to be soldered to. Use this along with the

option. I'm soldering a wire from the top to bottom via pad but you can use this to solder eyelets too. Lastly, the original via is not deleted and is intended as a way to reverse this action later if needed by deleting the footprint on top of it.
